entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • A combination of dotnet build and dotnet publish --no-build -p:PublishSingleFile=true does not work in .net8.0 #37367
  • Combining `--collect` and `--no-build` breaks test datacollector discovery #37352
  • Blocks unwanted dependencies in project or solution #37349
  • dotnet -ef on MacOS intelx64 throws error #37348

Closed

  • If PublishSingleFile=true is set in the project file it changes the behavior of dotnet build and similar #29795
    9.0.1xx
  • Dotnet build does not set correct exit code when used with -graph parameter #37224

PullRequests

Created

  • Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37370
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add escape hatch for publishing with SelfContained=true, but no RuntimeIdentifier. #37368
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Permit setting whether to use workload sets or loose manifests Fixes #34561 #37346
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Fix incorrect app host used in build when PublishSingleFile=true #37114
    area-Single-File, untriaged
  • Append command line arguments to project specified RunArguments #37285
    Servicing-approved, Area-Watch, 8.0.2
  • Correct emsdk Version.Details.xml sha #37305
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Ensure we deploy all Roslyn binaries into the MSBuildWorkspace BuildHosts #37340
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Don't copy MSBuild to Container outputs #37315
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move `src/Tests` to `test` #37200
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Disable Source Link's EmbedUntrackedSources in desktop WPF projects #37164
    Servicing-approved, Area-SourceLink, 8.0.2
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #37311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37339
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
